name: Kreepy's Boots - Short Non-Sense Story
description:
This is a short story of Kreepy's Boots, a small Mario-like side-scrolling platformer built around retro platforming concepts, full of secrets, coins, pit falls and more.

>>>>>>>>You may find the controls below:

>>>Xbox Controller:

A > Jump

X > Run

RB > Drop Shoes (When standing in altar)

>>>Keyboard:

Space > Jump

Shift > Run

Tab > Drop Shoes (When standing in altar)

I'll let you enjoy and see the game by yourself, any feedback is appreciated.

@mmenaig 

@mmenatwt
